sent.orig: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
sent.trans: 拿出勇气就是接受自己，不管它不为人所接受。

sent.orig: Thus, philosophical inquiry takes courage-perhaps not as much as Socrates showed -- but courage nevertheless.
sent.trans: 由此可见，哲学探索需要勇气——或许没有苏格拉底所表现的那样多——但总归是勇气吧。

sent.orig: But when fierce storms arises. only such courage as you can the courage and deliberate!
sent.trans: 但当狂风恶浪骤起时，却只有像您这样大智大勇的人方能临危不惧，泰然处之！

sent.orig: Even gentle and artful criticism takes courage-a courage I haven't always had.
sent.trans: 即使是温和而巧妙的批评也需要勇气——一种我不总是具备的勇气。

sent.orig: Woman: Summon the courage to live; the courage will turn the swamp into a spring.
sent.trans: 女：鼓起勇气生活，勇气会把沼泽变成清泉。
